title: Magnificent 7 Earnings Results Solidify Market Leadership
text: Given their enormous earnings power and growth profiles, it is hard to argue with the group's market leadership. Of the bunch, only NVIDIA remains to report.

title: Launch of Apple Vision Pro Supercharges Retailers' Adoption of VR
text: Mixed-reality technology is reshaping the landscape of the retail industry, ushering in an era of immersive experiences for consumers that blend the digital and physical. Apple released its first mixed-reality headset, Vision Pro, with 600 new apps and games Friday (Feb. 2).

title: Judge certifies Apple app store class action
text: A federal judge on Friday said tens of millions of Apple customers can pursue a class action accusing the company of monopolizing the market for iPhone apps by banning purchases outside its App Store, leading to higher prices.

title: Big Tech Crushes Earnings: Which One Should You Buy?
text: We saw a slew of earnings this week from the market's leading stocks, and they didn't disappoint. In addition to many other companies that reported earnings, five of the ‘Magnificent 7' informed us of their performance.

title: Apple's Vision Pro VR Headset Now Available In Stores—Can It Beat Meta's Quest?
text: Apple Inc. (AAPL) moved into augmented reality (AR) with Friday's launch of the Apple Vision Pro headset, setting it up for head-to-head competition with Meta Platforms Inc.

title: Apple Returns to Revenue Growth: 5 ETFs in Focus
text: Apple returned to quarterly sales growth after four straight quarters of declines. However, a decline in China sales pulled down the stock.

title: Apple's (AAPL) Q1 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Up Y/Y
text: Apple's (AAPL) first-quarter fiscal 2024 results benefit from strong iPhone revenues and Services growth.

title: Bloomberg Pro for Vision revolutionizes financial professionals' productivity with Apple Vision Pro
text: NEW YORK , Feb. 2, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Bloomberg today announced the launch of the all-new Bloomberg Pro for Vision app, a reimagined Bloomberg Professional® app built for the era of spatial computing. Bloomberg continually seeks new opportunities to help its customers improve their productivity, both on the desktop and on the go.

title: Apple's Vision Pro headset launches in U.S.
text: The new spatial computing headset is now available for pickup at all U.S. Apple Store locations and the online U.S. Apple Store.

title: Call Traders Buy Apple Stock's Post-Earnings Dip
text: Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL) stock is brushing off a fiscal first-quarter top- and bottom-line beat, last seen down down 2% to trade at $183.15, due to shrinking  China sales  and jobs data stateside.

title: Apple's sales plunged in China — these are the iPhone giant's 5 biggest problems right now
text: Apple is facing challenges in China from cautious consumer sentiment to intense competition, in particular from a rejuvenated Huawei.

title: Visage Launches Visage Ease VP™ for Apple Vision Pro
text: Visage's signature innovation further accelerates with the launch of Visage Ease VP SAN DIEGO , Feb. 2, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Visage Imaging, Inc. ("Visage"), a wholly owned subsidiary of Pro Medicus Ltd. (ASX: PME), has announced the launch of the groundbreaking Visage Ease VP for Apple Vision Pro, Apple's highly anticipated spatial computing platform released today.

title: Apple just did something unusual. Can it help the stock amid growth woes?
text: Apple Inc. executives have long maintained that the don't talk about forthcoming offerings before they're ready, and they mentioned that view again Thursday afternoon.

title: Master the Art of “How-to” with Expert Eyes by Squint on Apple Vision Pro
text: SAN JOSE, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- #AI--Today Squint (https://www.Squint.ai/), the technology platform that streamlines data entry, generates custom procedures, and makes every operator an expert, announced the launch of the Expert Eyes app for Apple Vision Pro. Expert Eyes effortlessly digitizes everyday routines by creating easy-to-follow spatial instructions for virtually any task. From Home Improvement and Education to Remote Training and more, the Apple Vision Pro app can solve virtually any pr.

title: AI fever fuels ‘big market delusion' that could leave investors holding the bag
text: It's time for tech earnings — and that means a lot of talk about the future of artificial intelligence and all the money it will make companies and their investors in the years and decades to come.

title: Is it a bubble? Magnificent 7 market cap equals the GDP of 11 major cities
text: At $12.5 trillion — and likely a whole lot more after Friday — the combined market cap of Microsoft MSFT, +1.56%, Apple AAPL, +1.33%, Alphabet GOOGL, +0.76%, Amazon.com AMZN, +2.63%, Nvidia NVDA, +2.44% and Tesla TSLA, +0.84% is equal to the combined GDP of New, York, Tokyo, London, Los Angeles, Paris, Seoul, Chicago, San Francisco, Osaka, Dallas and Shanghai, according to Bank of America calculations.

title: Apple says it'll show its GenAI efforts ‘later this year'
text: Apple has tossed another crumb to investors wondering when the world will get to see some ‘Made in Cupertino' GenAI: Expect Apple to reveal what it's been working on in this buzzy slice of artificial intelligence “later this year”, per CEO Tim Cook.

title: The best trades of the last 50 years show what investors should do now
text: Early Friday futures trading shows stock indices on the front foot. Whether they hold that optimism into Wall Street's opening bell may depend on labor market data.

title: Apple's China sales tumble highlights waning clout as local brands gain
text: Apple's weak China sales performance may have shocked investors, but customers and analysts have been noting the rising challenges the company faces in its third-largest market.

title: Warren Buffett Owns This Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stock, but Should You?
text: Buffett may not have bought Apple based on its AI capabilities, but it's become a part of the investment. AI is enhancing iOS, making Apple even stickier with users.

title: Apple Stock Sours for Wall Street. It Isn't Just a China Problem.
text: The tech giant “is likely to be range-bound and perform in line with the Nasdaq at best,” KeyBanc analysts said.

title: Here's How Much Apple Stock Gained in Each Year Since the iPhone Launched in 2007
text: Apple has a durable economic moat built on brand authority and proprietary software that gives it pricing power. Apple has a strong presence in several consumer electronics verticals, but its services business is the key to future growth.
